Heads Or Tails Game

This is an interactive game where you can play three basic games with the buttons above:

  • Click "Flip a Coin" to randomly flip a coin and see the result as a coin picture
  • Click "Flip multiple coins" to randomly flip as many coins as you indicate. See the result a summary of the results after
  • Click "Guess the result" to guess what the outcome will be. Resulting win/loose prompt will appear.
